actionTemplate.title: Han Trapezoid Lip
steps: Neutralize the natural lip color with a thin base of concealer/foundation
Draw a small rounded upper lip and a fuller trapezoid lower lip outline
Fill with lipstick and deepen the center for dimension
Clean edges with a cotton swab/concealer; blot to set

rationaleTemplate: Creates a classic historical proportion: smaller top, fuller bottom.
A neutral base helps the shape look crisp and last longer.
